# v0.22.37

## release on 20250526

## description

## changes

Changes

filters: remove the use of strings.Split (<a class="issue-link js-issue-link" data-error-text="Failed to load title" data-id="3076239134" data-permission-text="Title is private" data-url="https://github.com/zalando/skipper/issues/3508" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/zalando/skipper/pull/3508/hovercard" href="https://github.com/zalando/skipper/pull/3508">#3508</a>)

filters: remove use if strings.Split

1. updated the use of strings.Split in compress.go
2. updated the use of strings.Split in decompress.go
3. added results from benchmark tests

results of the updated functions:

updates: <a href="https://github.com/zalando-build/pg9-issues/issues/674">https://github.com/zalando-build/pg9-issues/issues/674</a>

Multiarch Docker image

Multiarch Docker image is available in Github's docker registry:

        docker run -it ghcr.io/zalando/skipper:v0.22.37 skipper --help

Docker image

Docker image is available in Zalando's Open Source registry:

        docker run -it registry.opensource.zalan.do/teapot/skipper:v0.22.37 skipper --help
